name: Wild Dragon Animals Hunter
description:
Feel the terror and menace of being a dragon!
Here is a wild dragon furious attack game for you to have forest animals hunting and human killing experience in different way.fantasy wild dragon are waiting for your permission in an incredible jungle. As you will start to play this wild dragon deer hunting game furious dragon will start to kill humans and hunt wild forest animals. Wild animals and forest peoples tracking system has been added in this anaconda hunter game. You just have to follow the animals Positions tracking system displayed on your device screen and start to find wild jungle animals including deers, wolfs and also humans. Hunt animals with furious dragon in your best time and challenge to your friends. 

Multiple dragons in different color and shapes e.g. green and furious red furious dragons are available in this game you just have to select your favorite dragon simulator and enjoy the different hunting strategy. You would have played a number of wild animals hunting with gun games e.g. gun shooting deer hunter 3d, panther shooting,chicken shooting, wild lion hunting attack, wolf hunting, dinosaurs hunting and crocodile hunting games available on google play store. But this time you will not hunt wild animals with modern gun or pistol but with extreme furious dragon by dropping fire on the animals. 

This is very thrilling hunting and animals killing game just for those hunter who love to controls dragons and attack on forest animals to hunt them. This is a kids special furious dragon attack game. Now don’t wait just download and install this wild dragon extreme furious attack 3D simulator and get ready to attack on big city and forest. Just like city attacking and forest animals attacking games you have to attack on crazy humans with your wild dragon and hunt the wolf and deers with dragon attack 3d. You have to control your wild dragon 3d simulator with joy stick and hunt the crazy animals in the forest. 

Smooth and realistic snake controls has been designed in this super deadly dragon attack game. Attractive user interfaces has been designed with adventurous dragon animations. You have to select any wild dragon 3d simulator. You will become fearless jungle hunter by playing this hunting game simulator 3d.

Features of wild dragon attack game:

- Multiple dragons in different colors
- Hunting forest animals with furious dragon simulator.
- Wild animals and city peoples positions tracking system
- Challenging and thrilling forest animals hunting missions 
- Different animals hunting strategy.
- Stunning and real forest full of wild animals
- Become the fearless hunter 2017
- Smooth and realistic wild dragon controls
- Real animated animals e.g. deers, wolfs, and also humans

Just install this wild dragon hunting game and become dragon hunter master. Give your positive feedback after playing this game..
